description: Leading a team of developers to build and maintain software solutions for the automotive industry. Focused on enhancing user experience and optimizing performance across various platforms.

In my current role as a Senior Frontend Developer, I focus on continuous improvement for e-commerce platforms built on Shopify and WordPress. My primary objective is to enhance the conversion rate (CRO) and customer value through targeted optimizations, driving better sales performance for various e-commerce businesses.
I collaborate closely with marketing and data teams to implement frontend changes that align with user behavior insights and business goals, ensuring that all adjustments result in a seamless and optimized shopping experience.

At Southern Code, I contributed to various projects across multiple industries, including finance, real-time location and security, real estate, and cryptocurrency. In each project, I served as a Senior Frontend Developer, working on both web and mobile platforms. I played a pivotal role in implementing new features and making critical decisions that influenced the projectâ€™s success and the overall development process.
My role consistently placed me on the front lines, where I collaborated closely with teams to design and develop responsive and efficient user interfaces. Additionally, I took an active part in the strategic planning and decision-making for each project, ensuring the best technologies and practices were utilized to meet business needs.
